Description.Text: Dashwood apartments are located off site in a quiet corner of central Banbury and offer hotel clients a real alternative to a conventional Hotel. Check in is as normal at the hotel and directions to the apartments which are located a couple of minutes walk away are given. Ideal for the frequent business traveller as well as those needing short term accommodation when relocating to the area. Comprising of one and two bedrooms, fully furnished apartments are bookable for stays from seven nights to six months, subject to availability. All apartments conform to a very high quality standard and are wholly owned and operated by The Best Western Banbury House Hotel. Facilities: Each of the 16 apartments has been thoughtfully planned to create a living experience of comfort and relaxation. Hotel designers have furnished each apartment in a contemporary style to provide a modern home from home atmosphere. There is no meal option for the apartments & special terms and conditions apply to the apartments, please contact the hotel for more information. Your apartment will be cleaned daily, linen & towels will be changed twice weekly. A comprehensive information pack with details on local amenities, entertainment, restaurants and cinema.

The market town of Banbury is on the edge of the Oxfordshire Cotswolds and is a great place from which to explore the local area. Indeed, just a brief walk from the hotel is the famous Banbury Cross from the well-known nursery rhyme, whilst the special Banbury Cakes have been produced in the area for over 300 years now. Just over a 30 minute drive from the Hotel is the world-famous Silverstone Racetrack, home of the British Grand Prix. A world heritage site and the birthplace of Winston Churchill, its rich history emanates through its beautiful gardens, gilded State Rooms and vast collections of treasures. There are plenty more historical attractions in the area including the picturesque beauty of Broughton Castle, just a 7 minute drive from the hotel. Further afield is Warwick Castle, with over a thousand years of jaw-dropping history it offers stunning scenery, epic re-enactments and magical attractions for the whole family to enjoy.

Classic Apartment - This is a 1 bedroomed self contained Apartment offers one Double bed. which is fully furnished and bookable for stays from seven nights to six months, subject to availability. All apartments conform to a very high quality standard.
Classic Apartment - This is a 2 bed roomed self contained Apartment offers two Double beds, which is fully furnished and bookable for stays from seven nights to six months, subject to availability. All apartments conform to a very high quality standard.
